title: Global ults firing off target
body: At least 2 times that I can be sure of(maybe a couple others that I wasn't sure of), I fired global ult at a long distance, and the target ended up being about a half a screen to the left of where I clicked.  It's happened with Jinx and Ziggs, and both of them had the ult fire to the left about the same distance from where I clicked.  Kinda horrible to just randomly ult some trees.  I don't hate nature :P

replies.body:
This *might* be related to the delayed/lost input issue that a lot of people are experiencing.

The reason I think that's possible is because I've had that happen with other skills and the item shop.  Once I died in a game yesterday, I tried to finish my Statikk Shiv.  I already had Zeal and Avarice Blade, plus another 1100+ gold.  When I right-clicked the Shiv on the right side of the shop (full recipe view), nothing happened.  I assumed it just hadn't registered the click, so I clicked it several times really fast, then moved my mouse down to the left to buy something with my remaining gold.  Then I realized I had almost no gold left, and saw that I had bought another Zeal.  None of those clicks had registered while I was hovering over Statikk Shiv, but one of them triggered while I was moving my mouse *after* I stopped clicking.

Oh whoa... that kinda explains some of the most odd misses that I've done(backwards braum shield op)

Neat that you were able to pinpoint it like that, nice attention to detail :)
Lux's laser too. It's gone way off target at times recently and I'm pretty sure it wasn't just me screwing up *that* badly.
